RelatedSentence: The event took place at a physician 's home in the Washington suburb of Potomac , Maryland , as Obama seeks to persuade Democrats to organize for a voter turnout effort to prevent Republicans from ousting Democrats from control of the Senate and from building on their majority in the House .

The event took place at a physician 's home in the Washington suburb of Potomac , Maryland , as Obama seeks to persuade Democrats to organize for a voter turnout effort to prevent Republicans from ousting Democrats from control of the Senate and from building on their majority in the House .
Republicans in the House have begun a new investigation of the deaths of the U.S. ambassador to Libya , Christopher Stevens , and three other Americans during a militant attack on Sept .
The new probe was spawned by the disclosure of an email from Obama national security aide Ben Rhodes .

Rhodes used the email to prepare Obama aide Susan Rice for television appearances , telling her to stress that the protests rocking the Muslim world at the time were not rooted in a broader failure of policy .
